title: Valoidate field sent to GEF
custom_steps:
Validate the following fields in the event sent to GEF
1. type - should be smtp_dem_metric
2. timestamp - should be timestamp at which event was sent
3. metric_name - expected name
4. tenant_id
5. pop - POP where the service is running (note that this is not the home pop of the tenant)
6. value - the aggregate value

Also, in GefMetadata field, following fields are there - 
1. _event_id - random string
2. _home_pop - home pop of the tenant
3. _service_id - 'service-smtp-proxy'
4. _tenant_id
5. timestamp
6. type - smtp_dem_metric
custom_expected:
Validate the following fields in the event sent to GEF
1. type - should be smtp_dem_metric
2. timestamp - should be timestamp at which event was sent
3. metric_name - expected name
4. tenant_id
5. pop - POP where the service is running (note that this is not the home pop of the tenant)
6. value - the aggregate value

Also, in GefMetadata field, following fields are there - 
1. _event_id - random string
2. _home_pop - home pop of the tenant
3. _service_id - 'service-smtp-proxy'
4. _tenant_id
5. timestamp
6. type - smtp_dem_metric
